original_title: Impressive boost in remittances from Sri Lankan foreign workers
original_body_lines: A total of USD 541 million in foreign exchange was sent to Sri Lanka boosting the remittances from Sri Lankan foreign workers, Labour and Foreign Employment Minister Manusha Nanayakkara said.
Receipts of foreign remittances have increased by 78% since last year. The cumulative remittances by Sri Lanka's global workforce reached USD 3363.6 million. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
